data.name: UnitConfig_Hardware_Brightness_Description
data.value: Choose the brightness mode and parameters for the displays. The speed is between 1 (about one minute) and 10 (instantly).

data.name: UnitConfig_Hardware_DviLevel_Description
data.value: Configure the levels and output currents of the DVI ports.

data.name: UnitConfig_Hardware_Inputs_Description
data.value: Define the names of all digital inputs in a unit. These names will be used later wherever you have to select a digital input.

data.name: UnitConfig_Hardware_MultiScreen_Description
data.value: Choose how content should be displayed on the two screens. Cloning is only possible if both screens have the same resolution.

data.name: UnitConfig_Hardware_Outputs_Description
data.value: Define the names of all digital outputs in a unit. These names will be used later wherever you have to select a digital output.

data.name: UnitConfig_Hardware_Rs485Mode_Description
data.value: Choose whether the RS-485 port is used by the AT91 controller or whether it should be accessible by an application. If it is not connected to the AT91, it will not be possible to control the attached TFT displays.

data.name: UnitConfig_Hardware_Transceivers_Description
data.value: Configure the multi-protocol transceivers with their type, mode and termination.

data.name: UnitConfiguration_UnsavedBox_Content
data.value: The current Unit Configuration has unsaved changes. Do you want to save them?

data.name: Errors_DuplicateName
data.value: This name is already used, please use a different name.

data.name: Errors_NoItemSelected
data.value: Please select an item from the list.

data.name: Errors_TextNotWhitespace
data.value: Text cannot be empty or only contain whitespace.

data.name: UnitConfig_Conclusion_ExportPreparation_Description
data.value: Changes made here are not stored in the unit configuration.

data.name: Errors_DuplicateValue
data.value: This value is already used, please use a different value.

data.name: Errors_ValidDateTime
data.value: Please select a valid date and time

data.name: Errors_ValidEmail
data.value: Value must be a valid e-mail address.

data.name: Errors_ValidUnitName
data.value: The unit name must be in the format TFT-xx-xx-xx with 'x' being a hex character (0-9, A-F).

data.name: Errors_ValidXml
data.value: The value must be a valid XML document.

data.name: Requests_Delete_MessageFormat
data.value: Do you really want to delete the {0} "{1}" (id={2})?

data.name: ServerError_DeleteEntity_MessageFormat
data.value: Failed to delete the {0} "{1}". Please inspect the logs for details.

data.name: ServerError_LoadEntityDetails_MessageFormat
data.value: Couldn't load details of the {0} "{1}". Please inspect the logs for details.

data.name: ServerError_NavigateTo_MessageFormat
data.value: Failed to navigate to the {0} "{1}". Please inspect the logs for details.

data.name: ServerError_SaveEntity_MessageFormat
data.value: Failed to save the {0} "{1}". Please inspect the logs for details.

data.name: UnitConfig_Conclusion_ExportPreparation_ReloadQuery
data.value: The unit configuration has changed, you should reload the entire export preview. All changes done manually to any files will be lost. Do you want to reload the export?

data.name: UnitConfig_Conclusion_ExportPreparation_ErrorFormat
data.value: There was an error while creating the export folder structure, the resulting structure might be incomplete. ({0})

data.name: UnitConfig_Software_Incoming_Description
data.value: Choose all the kinds of data that are coming into your system from other systems.

data.name: UnitConfig_Software_Incoming_Medi
data.value: Medi (this Unit is a Medi slave connected to a Medi master)

data.name: UnitConfig_Software_Incoming_LamXimple
data.value: LAM (Location Awareness Module Ximple Protocol) Stops, Route Ladder, WiFi Zones, GPS

data.name: UnitConfig_Software_Outgoing_Description
data.value: Choose all the kinds of data that are leaving your system towards other systems or the passenger.

data.name: UnitConfig_Software_Outgoing_Medi
data.value: Medi (this Unit is a Medi master to which Medi slaves can connect)

data.name: Errors_MediMasterAndSlave
data.value: The configuration contains both a Medi master and a Medi slave, this is probably wrong.

data.name: Errors_NoExportDueToError
data.value: The configuration can't be exported due to errors. Please fix the errors above first before continuing with the export.

data.name: Errors_NoIncomingOutgoing
data.value: The configuration doesn't contain any incoming or outgoing data, this is probably wrong.

data.name: Errors_LamButNoAudio
data.value: When Ximple (LAM) is selected, Audio MUX must also be selected.

data.name: Errors_AudioButNoLam
data.value: When Audio MUX is selected, Ximple (LAM) must also be selected.

data.name: UnitConfig_Conclusion_ExportExecution_Description
data.value: Here you can export the configuration to the selected Update Groups. Exporting the configuration will save it to the database and then create the necessary data to be sent to the Units.

data.name: ServerError_ExportUpdates_Message
data.value: Couldn't export updates for the selected Units to the removable media.

data.name: ServerError_ImportFeedback_Message
data.value: Couln't import feedback from the removable media.

data.name: UnitConfig_Conclusion_ExportExecution_Exported
data.value: The Unit Configuration was successfully exported to the selected Update Group(s). You can now close this editor or create and export a new version.

data.name: UnitConfig_Conclusion_LocalDownload_Description
data.value: You have the possibility to download locally the folder structure you just exported. Be aware that only the Unit Configuration including the software will be exported and no other files are included (e.g. from icenter.media).

data.name: UnitConfig_Conclusion_LocalDownload_FolderSelection
data.value: Select a local folder to download structure

data.name: Warnings_FolderNotEmpty_MessageFormat
data.value: The folder '{0}' is not empty. It will be cleared before continuing with the download.

data.name: UnitConfig_TimeSync_Ibis_Description
data.value: Set the correct configuration for IBIS telegrams DS005, DS006 and DS006a.

data.name: UnitConfig_TimeSync_Sntp_Description
data.value: Select the options for time synchronization using Simple Network Time Protocol (SNTP).

data.name: UnitConfig_TimeSync_Source_Description
data.value: Choose how to synchronize the system time from an outside source.

data.name: UnitConfig_TimeSync_Vdv301_Description
data.value: Select the options for time synchronization via VDV 301 (IBIS over IP).

data.name: UnitConfig_SystemConfig_ConfigMode_Description
data.value: Select if you wish to configure the system differently for different I/O values. For each setting you can choose how it is configured. This can be used for example with coded cables.

data.name: UnitConfig_SystemConfig_ConfigMode_Multi
data.value: Different settings for different I/O values

data.name: Errors_ValidIpAddress
data.value: Value must be a valid IP address.

data.name: UnitConfig_SystemConfig_Global_Description
data.value: Choose the global settings that are valid independent of I/O states to be used in this step. Editors are only enabled if they were selected in the "Configuration Mode" before.

data.name: UnitConfig_SystemConfig_IO_Description
data.value: Choose the I/O states as well as the settings to be used in this step. Editors are only enabled if they were selected in the "Configuration Mode" before.

data.name: UnitConfig_SystemConfig_Single_Description
data.value: Set your system settings here. Editors are only enabled if they were selected in the "Configuration Mode" before.

data.name: Errors_SelectOneAtLeast
data.value: Please select at least one item from the list.

data.name: Errors_SelectOnlyOne
data.value: Please select only one item from the list.

data.name: Errors_SelectBoth
data.value: Both must be selected for this channel.

data.name: UnitConfig_Update_Azure_Description
data.value: AzureConfigure the options for updates via Azure.

data.name: UnitConfig_Update_FTP_Description
data.value: Configure the options for updates via an FTP server.

data.name: UnitConfig_Update_Methods_ChooseOne
data.value: At least USB, FTP or Medi Slave update should be chosen, otherwise the system is not updateable anymore in the future.

data.name: UnitConfig_Update_Methods_Description
data.value: Choose from the possbile methods how to update the system. If FTP is not available, it means that your icenter.BackgroundSystem is not configured to use FTP.

data.name: UnitConfig_Update_USB_Description
data.value: Configure the options for updates via USB stick.

data.name: UnitConfig_Software_MediSlave_Description
data.value: Choose how to connect this unit to the Medi Master.

data.name: UnitConfig_Update_MediMaster_Description
data.value: Configure the options for updates towards Medi Slaves (this Unit acts as a Medi Master).

data.name: UnitConfig_Update_MediSlave_Description
data.value: Configure the options for updates from a Medi Master (this Unit acts as a Medi Slave).

data.name: UnitConfig_Update_Methods_BothMedi
data.value: A unit can't be Medi Master and Medi Slave at the same time, please choose only one option.

data.name: XmlEditor_OK_NoSchema
data.value: XML is valid (no schema validation done).

data.name: XmlEditor_OK_WithSchema
data.value: XML is valid and validated against schema.

data.name: UnitConfig_Ahdlc_General_Description
data.value: Configure the general settings for the AHDLC Renderer.

data.name: UnitConfig_Ahdlc_Sign_Description
data.value: Configure the properties of the sign.

data.name: UnitConfig_Composer_General_Description
data.value: Choose the settings for Infomedia Composer.

data.name: UnitConfig_DirectX_General_BadTimeout
data.value: Fallback timeout must be at least 20 seconds (or zero to disable it)

data.name: UnitConfig_DirectX_General_Description
data.value: Choose the general settings for DirectX Renderer. The default fallback image (when no data is available) is the DirectX Renderer splash screen, if you wish to show a customer specific image, please choose one above.

data.name: UnitConfig_DirectX_Image_CacheMegaBytes
data.value: Maximum Size of Bitmap Cache (in MB)

data.name: UnitConfig_DirectX_Image_Description
data.value: Choose the image rendering options. Modifying the cache size can cause big memory consumption by DirectX Renderer.

data.name: UnitConfig_DirectX_Image_MegaBytesPerBitmap
data.value: Maximum Megabytes per Bitmap to Cache

data.name: UnitConfig_DirectX_Text_Description
data.value: Choose the mode in which text should be rendered. GDI mode is only experimental and should only be used when rotated texts are required.

data.name: UnitConfig_DirectX_Video_Description
data.value: Choose the mode in which video should be played back.

data.name: UnitConfig_DirectX_Video_VideoMode_VlcWindow
data.value: VLC Player in a Separate Window

data.name: UnitConfig_Audio_Acapela_Description
data.value: Configure the voices that should be available for Acapela text-to-speech. Be aware that every voice takes about 100-200 MB of harddisk space, so choose wisely!

data.name: UnitConfig_Audio_Channel_Description
data.value: Configure the speaker I/Os for this audio channel.

data.name: UnitConfig_Audio_General_Description
data.value: Configure the general settings for the Audio Renderer.

data.name: UnitConfig_Conclusion_SoftwareVersions_Description
data.value: Select the version for each software package to be installed. Be careful to choose versions that are compatible with each other.

data.name: Editor_EnterDurationOrEmpty
data.value: Enter a valid duration or leave empty

data.name: UnitConfig_Hardware_Reboot_Description
data.value: Choose if and when to automatically reboot the system. Not selecting any value will disable the respective type of reboot.

data.name: UnitConfig_SplashScreens_HotKey_Description
data.value: Configure the splash screen shown when the user presses Win-S on the Unit.

data.name: UnitConfig_SplashScreens_LocalButton_Description
data.value: Configure the splash screen shown when the user presses the hardware button on the Unit.

data.name: UnitConfig_SplashScreens_RemoteButton_Description
data.value: Configure the splash screen shown when the user presses the hardware button on a Unit connected to the one being configured. Be aware that the button must be named "Button" on the other Unit for this splash screen to show.

data.name: UnitConfig_SplashScreens_StartUp_Description
data.value: Configure the splash screen shown when the device starts up.

data.name: UnitConfig_Transformations_General_Description
data.value: Choose the number of transformations to be available in this configuration.

data.name: UnitConfig_Transformations_Transformation_Description
data.value: Edit this transformation by adding or removing items to the list. You can also rearrange and duplicate items using drag-and-drop.

data.name: UnitConfig_IoProtocol_General_Description
data.value: Choose the number of inputs you want to handle with Protran.

data.name: UnitConfig_IoProtocol_Input_Description
data.value: Configure which input should be handled, through which transformation it should go and in which generic cell the data should be put. As an input name you can choose a known one from this configuration or enter the name yourself.

data.name: UnitConfig_Ibis_General_Description
data.value: Configure the general options of VDV 300 (IBIS) handling in Protran.

data.name: UnitConfig_Ibis_Simulation_DescriptionFormat
data.value: Configure the IBIS simulation which uses the data file under {0}. If the "Interval Between Telegrams" is left empty, the telegrams will be replayed with the timing in the recording.

data.name: UnitConfig_Ibis_Simulation_TimesToRepeat
data.value: Number of Times to Repeat File

data.name: UnitConfig_Ibis_TelegramSelection_Description
data.value: Check the IBIS telegrams to be handled by Protran. The date and time telegrams (DS005, DS006 and DS006a) are configured in the category "Time Synchronization".

data.name: UnitConfig_Ibis_Telegram_DescriptionFormat
data.value: Configure how to handle {0} , through which transformation it should go and in which generic cell(s) the data should be put.

data.name: UnitConfig_Ibis_UdpServer_Description
data.value: Configure the IBIS over UDP server.

data.name: UnitConfig_Ibis_UdpServer_Format_Full
data.value: Full telegram including header, payload, <CR> and checksum.

data.name: UnitConfig_Ibis_UdpServer_Format_NoChecksum
data.value: Header, payload and <CR> but no checksum.

data.name: UnitConfig_Ibis_UdpServer_Format_NoFooter
data.value: Header and payload, but no <CR> and checksum.

data.name: UnitConfig_Vdv301_DataItemSelection_Description
data.value: Select the data items to be used by Protran. For each selected data item, you will be able to configure its transformation and usage.

data.name: UnitConfig_Vdv301_DataItem_DescriptionFormat
data.value: Data item "{0}": Configure how to handle recived data , through which transformation(s) it should go and in which generic cell(s) the data should be put.

data.name: UnitConfig_Vdv301_General_Description
data.value: Configure the general options of VDV 301 (IBIS-IP) handling in Protran. If the Subscription Timeout is not set, it will never time out.

data.name: UnitConfig_Vdv301_Service_DescriptionFormat
data.value: Configure the general options for the service "{0}". Usually you should let Protran find the service with DNS-SD. The operations can be configured in the next steps.

data.name: Errors_NoLanguageDefined
data.value: Please define at least one language mapping.

data.name: Errors_NoSemicolon
data.value: The text should contain a semicolon delimited (CSV) list

data.name: UnitConfig_Ibis_HPW074_Description
data.value: Configure how to handle HPW074 , through which transformation it should go and in which generic cell the data should be put. The Special Text is a semicolon delimited (CSV) list of index (received from the telegram) and lines of text to send out.

data.name: UnitConfig_Protran_Persistence_Description
data.value: Choose if you want to persist data from certain telegrams to the disk and for how long the data should be valid afterwards. If enabled the last messages from news feeds will be restored on startup.

data.name: UnitConfig_Vdv301_Languages_Description
data.value: Define which Ximple languages (left) should be filled with which VDV 301 languages (right). If there is no mapping for a given Ximple language, enter dash ("-") in the text box.

data.name: UnitConfig_Ibis_DS021aConnections_Description
data.value: Configure the DS021a telegram's connection handling ('A' variant).

data.name: UnitConfig_Ibis_DS021aConnections_ShowForStop_Any
data.value: Any following stop that has connections

data.name: UnitConfig_Ibis_DS021aConnections_UsedForDepartureTime
data.value: Generic Cell for Connection Transfer Time

data.name: UnitConfig_Ibis_DS021aConnections_UsedForLineNumber
data.value: Generic Cell for Connection Line Number

data.name: UnitConfig_Ibis_DS021aConnections_UsedForStopName
data.value: Generic Cell for Stop Name of Connections

data.name: UnitConfig_Ibis_DS021a_UsedForAbsoluteTime
data.value: Generic Cell for Absolute Stop Time

data.name: UnitConfig_Ibis_DS021a_UsedForDestinationAbsoluteTime
data.value: Generic Cell for Absolute Destination Time

data.name: UnitConfig_Ibis_DS021a_UsedForDestinationRelativeTime
data.value: Generic Cell for Relative Destination Time

data.name: UnitConfig_Ibis_DS021a_UsedForRelativeTime
data.value: Generic Cell for Relative Stop Time

data.name: UnitConfig_Ibis_DS021a_UsedForText
data.value: Generic Cell for Text Messages ('S' Variant)

data.name: UnitConfig_Ibis_DS021Base_FromBlock
data.value: Block from which to take the information

data.name: UnitConfig_Ibis_DS021Base_LastStopMode_HideDestination
data.value: Hide destination when last stop is visible in stop list

data.name: UnitConfig_Ibis_DS021Base_LastStopMode_HideLastStop
data.value: Show last stop only as destination (never in stop list)

data.name: UnitConfig_Ibis_DS021Base_LastStopMode_ShowAll
data.value: Always show last stop in stop list and as destination

data.name: UnitConfig_Ibis_DS021Base_UsedForDestinationTransfers
data.value: Generic Cell for Destination Transfer Names

data.name: UnitConfig_Ibis_DS021Base_UsedForDestinationTransferSymbols
data.value: Generic Cell for Destination Transfer Symbols

data.name: UnitConfig_Ibis_DS021Base_UsedForTransfers
data.value: Generic Cell for Stop Transfer Names

data.name: UnitConfig_Ibis_DS021Base_UsedForTransferSymbols
data.value: Generic Cell for Stop Transfer Symbols

data.name: UnitConfig_Ibis_DS021c_AsciiLineNumberUsedFor
data.value: Generic Cell for ASCII Line Number

data.name: UnitConfig_Ibis_GO005_BufferNextRoute
data.value: Buffer Next Route Until Index Reset

data.name: UnitConfig_Ibis_GO005_HideNextStopForIndex
data.value: Hide Next Stop When Index Received

data.name: UnitConfig_Ibis_TelegramSelection_DS021andGO005
data.value: The DS021 and GO005 telegrams can't be selected at the same time since they use the same header.

data.name: UnitConfig_Ibis_TelegramSelection_XexcludesY_Format
data.value: Telegrams {0} and {1} can't be selected at the same time.

data.name: UnitConfig_Ibis_TelegramSelection_XrequiresY_Format
data.value: Telegram {0} requires {1} also to be selected as well.

data.name: Errors_NoRS485Configured_Format
data.value: Your hardware configuration doesn't contain an RS-485 serial port. Most probably AHDLC will not work. Please check {0} > {1}

data.name: ServerError_AddEntity_MessageFormat
data.value: Failed to add a {0}. Please inspect the logs for details.

data.name: UnitConfig_DirectX_General_ScreenId_Watermark
data.value: Leave empty to use default screen id or set your own id

data.name: UnitConfig_Conclusion_ExportExecution_NoUpdateGroupSelected
data.value: Please select at least one Update Group to perform the export.

data.name: UnitConfig_SettingValidator_UnsupportedValueFormat
data.value: '{0}' is not supported by the selected software version, it should be left at its default value '{1}' or {2} version {3} (or higher) should be selected.

data.name: ServerError_CopyEntity_MessageFormat
data.value: Failed to copy the selected {0}. Please inspect the logs for details.

data.name: ServerError_EditEntity_MessageFormat
data.value: Failed to edit the selected {0}. Please inspect the logs for details.

data.name: Errors_ValidVersion
data.value: Value must be a valid version number.

data.name: BgsSettings_MaintenanceModeConfirmationMessage
data.value: Activating the maintenance mode disables all users in the system. Do you want to continue?

data.name: SystemConfig_ReasonWatermark
data.value: Please enter a reason. This will be shown in all applications.

data.name: BgsSettingsError_LoadData_Message
data.value: Couldn't load data for the BackgroundSystemSettings. Please inspect the logs for further details.

data.name: BgsSettingsError_UpdateMaintenanceMode_Message
data.value: Couldn't update maintenance mode settings. Please inspect the logs for further details.

data.name: BgsSettings_NotAdminUser
data.value: Only the user 'admin' is allowed to change BackgroundSystem settings

data.name: UnitConfig_Init_LoadData_Description
data.value: Choose how this Unit Configuration should be initialized.

data.name: UnitConfig_Init_LoadData_WrongProductTypeFormat
data.value: The selected Unit Configuration has a different Product Type than the current ({0}).

data.name: UnitConfig_TimeSync_Broadcast_MediWarning
data.value: Broadcast of time changes should be enabled in Medi Slave mode.

data.name: Errors_ProvidePasswordOrDomain
data.value: Please enter a password or provide the domain name.

data.name: Editor_SaveNewEntityTooltip
data.value: Save new entity to the database

data.name: Stage_CopyCurrentEntryTooltip
data.value: Copy current entity and edit it

data.name: Editors_PackageVersion_AddFileTooltip
data.value: Upload a file to be added to the selected folder

data.name: Editors_PackageVersion_AddFolderTooltip
data.value: Add a subfolder to the selected folder

data.name: UnitConfiguration_Export_Tooltip
data.value: Export the Unit Configuration to a file

data.name: UnitConfig_NamedList_Add_Tooltip
data.value: Add an item to the list

data.name: UnitConfig_NamedList_Remove_Tooltip
data.value: Remove the selected item from the list

data.name: UnitConfig_Protran_Transformations_Add_Tooltip
data.value: Add a new transformation after the selected transformation

data.name: UnitConfig_Software_BGSConnection_Connect_Slave
data.value: A Medi slave should never be connected to the icenter.suite directly. This should be done in the Medi master.

data.name: UnitConfig_Software_BGSConnection_Description
data.value: Configure if this Unit should connect to the Background System of the icenter.suite. This requires that the Unit has a permanent connection to the internet.

data.name: UnitConfig_DirectX_Text_FontQuality_AntiAliased_Description
data.value: Font is antialiased, if it supports antialiasing and if its size falls within the accepted range.

data.name: UnitConfig_DirectX_Text_FontQuality_ClearTypeNatural_Description
data.value: Text is rendered using the ClearType antialiasing method when possible. The font quality is given more importance than maintaining the text size; thus, the text width can change.

data.name: UnitConfig_DirectX_Text_FontQuality_ClearType_Description
data.value: Text is rendered using the ClearType antialiasing method when possible. The font quality is given less importance than maintaining the text size.

data.name: UnitConfig_DirectX_Text_FontQuality_Default_Description
data.value: Lowest setting. The font's appearence does not matter.

data.name: UnitConfig_DirectX_Text_FontQuality_Draft_Desciption
data.value: Missing font sizes are calculated, but their quality migth be lower. Bold, italic, underline, and strikeout fonts are synthesized if necessary.

data.name: UnitConfig_DirectX_Text_FontQuality_Proof_Description
data.value: The font's character quality is more important than exact logical-font attributes. Font scaling is disabled and the font closest in size is chosen. Bold, italic, underline, and strikeout fonts are synthesized if necessary.

data.name: UnitConfig_Update_Methods_AzureAndMediSlave
data.value: A Medi Slave shouldn't directly connect to Azure. Only the Medi Master should do so.

data.name: UnitConfig_Update_Methods_AzureNoBGS
data.value: Can't use Azure as an update method if the Unit is not connected to the icenter.suite.

data.name: BgsSettingsError_UpdateAzureProvider_Message
data.value: Couldn't update settings for Azure Update Provider. Please inspect the logs for further details.

data.name: BgsSettingsError_UpdateAzureProvider_Title
data.value: Update of Azure Update Provider failed

data.name: Editors_InstallationAction_AddFileTooltip
data.value: Add a local file to be transfered to the temporary folder on the unit.

data.name: Editors_InstallationAction_AddLocalExecutableTooltip
data.value: Adds a local executable to the action list. The executable will be transfered to the unit and executed in the temporary folder as working directory.

data.name: Editors_InstallationAction_AddUnitExecutableTooltip
data.value: Add a path to an executable on the unit to the action list. The executable is executed useing the temporary folder as working directory.

data.name: UnitConfig_Conclusion_PostInstallationAction_Description
data.value: Specify actions which will be executed after the unit update. Additional files will be copied immediately before the actions are executed.

data.name: UnitConfig_Conclusion_PreInstallationAction_Description
data.value: Specify actions which will be executed before the unit update. Additional files will be copied immediately before the actions are executed.

data.name: Editors_InstallationAction_ArgumentTooltip
data.value: Arguments to be passed to the executable.

data.name: Editors_InstallationAction_RemoveAdditionalFileTooltip
data.value: Remove the file from the transfer list.

data.name: Editors_InstallationAction_TextBoxUnitExecutableTooltip
data.value: The path to the executable on the unit.

data.name: Editors_InstallationAction_Error_EmptyUnitExecutable
data.value: Unit executable action without a path.

data.name: UnitConfiguration_UnsavedConfiguration_Content
data.value: The current configuration contains unsaved changes or installation actions. Continue?{0}Yes: Save changes {0}No: Discard changes

data.name: Errors_ValidMd5Hash
data.value: The value must be a valid MD5 hash

data.name: UnitConfig_ThorebC90_Bus_Description
data.value: Configure the xml settings for the Bus module

data.name: UnitConfig_ThorebC90_Ibis_Description
data.value: Configure the xml settings for the IBIS Control module

data.name: UnitConfig_ThorebC90_Terminal_Description
data.value: Configure the xml settings for the Terminal module

data.name: UnitConfig_MainUnit_Configuration_Description
data.value: Configure the xml settings for the Main Unit

data.name: UnitConfig_MainUnit_DisplayUnit_Description
data.value: The content of a display unit can be set by a file or a URL. An URL will be polled for new content in the given update interval.

data.name: UnitConfig_MainUnit_DisplayUnit_StaticContentFile_DialogTitle
data.value: Select a file to be displayed

data.name: UnitConfig_DisplayUnit_ErrorShowingUrl
data.value: Can not open previw in browser.

data.name: UnitConfig_DisplayUnit_ErrorUploadingStaticResource
data.value: Could not upload selected static resource for display unit: {0}

data.name: UnitConfiguration_Export_Error_NoUnitsInUpdateGroup
data.value: Couldn't export to update group '{0}' because it doesn't contain any units.

data.name: UnitConfiguration_Export_Error_TooManyUnitsInUpdateGroup
data.value: Couldn't export to update group '{0}' because it contains more than one unit.
